member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.StaticFiles.DefaultFilesMiddleware
member.summary: This examines a directory path and determines if there is a default file present. If so the file name is appended to the path and execution continues. Note we don't just serve the file because it may require interpretation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.StaticFiles.DefaultFilesMiddleware.#ctor(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.RequestDelegate,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment,Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptions{Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.DefaultFilesOptions})
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the DefaultFilesMiddleware.
member.param: The next middleware in the pipeline.
The configuration options for this middleware.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.StaticFiles.DefaultFilesMiddleware.Invoke(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext)
member.summary: This examines the request to see if it matches a configured directory, and if there are any files with the configured default names in that directory. If so this will append the corresponding file name to the request path for a later middleware to handle.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.StaticFiles.DirectoryBrowserMiddleware
member.summary: Enables directory browsing

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the SendFileMiddleware.
member.param: The next middleware in the pipeline.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.StaticFiles.DirectoryBrowserMiddleware.Invoke(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext)
member.summary: Examines the request to see if it matches a configured directory. If so, a view of the directory contents is returned.
